# multiTokenContexts

**Instance Property**

An array of payment token contexts that requests multiple payment tokens to support a multimerchant payment.

## Declaration

```swift
sequence <ApplePayPaymentTokenContext> multiTokenContexts;
```

## Discussion

Use multitoken contexts to indicate payments for multiple merchants. The sum of the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentTokenContext/amount] of all the payment token contexts must be less than or equal to the grand total amount of the enclosing payment request. Otherwise, the request results in an error and cancels the payment request.



## Requesting multitoken or multimerchant payments

- **ApplePayPaymentTokenContext**: A dictionary that defines the context for a single payment token in a payment request for multimerchant payments.
